tests.title: Available Tests
tests.subtitle: Discover your personality and abilities through our scientifically validated tests
tests.noResults: You haven't completed this test yet

bigFive.title: Big Five
bigFive.description: The Big Five test measures the five fundamental dimensions of personality

explanation.title: Big Five Test Explanation
explanation.description: Big Five is one of the most validated and used personality models in psychology. It measures five fundamental dimensions of human personality.

openness.name: Openness to Experience
openness.description: Measures creativity, curiosity, and openness to new ideas

conscientiousness.name: Conscientiousness
conscientiousness.description: Reflects organization, discipline, and goal orientation

extraversion.name: Extraversion
extraversion.description: Indicates social energy and tendency to seek external stimulation

agreeableness.name: Agreeableness
agreeableness.description: Measures cooperation, trust, and empathy towards others

neuroticism.name: Neuroticism
neuroticism.description: Reflects emotional stability and tendency to experience negative emotions

disc.title: DISC
disc.description: The DISC test analyzes your behavioral style in four main dimensions

explanation.title: DISC Test Explanation
explanation.description: DISC is a behavioral assessment tool that categorizes people into four main personality types.

interpretation.general: Your DISC result shows your predominant behavioral style in different situations.

hexaco.title: HEXACO
hexaco.description: The HEXACO model extends Big Five with the Honesty-Humility dimension

explanation.title: HEXACO Test Explanation
explanation.description: HEXACO is an extension of the Big Five model that includes a sixth dimension: Honesty-Humility.

H.name: Honesty-Humility
H.description: Measures sincerity, modesty, and lack of greed

E.name: Emotionality
E.description: Reflects anxiety, sensitivity, and emotional dependence

O.name: Openness to Experience
O.description: Measures creativity, curiosity, and aesthetic appreciation

belbin.title: Belbin Team Roles
belbin.description: Discover your preferred team roles according to the Belbin model

explanation.title: Belbin Test Explanation
explanation.description: The Belbin test identifies the roles you prefer to play in a team, based on your natural strengths.

cattell.title: 16PF Cattell
cattell.description: Personality assessment on 16 factors according to the Cattell model
cattell.comingSoon: This feature will be available soon.

emotionalIntelligence.title: Emotional Intelligence
emotionalIntelligence.description: Evaluate your ability to understand and manage emotions
emotionalIntelligence.comingSoon: This feature will be available soon.

cognitive.title: Cognitive Abilities
cognitive.description: Test memory, attention, and other cognitive functions

careerPaths.title: Your Personalized Career Plans
careerPaths.subtitle: AI creates career plans based on your test results, giving you a clear path to your professional goals.

dashboard.title: Career Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Monitor your progress and plan your next steps.

cvOptimization.title: CV Optimization
cvOptimization.description: Analyze your CV against a job description to improve your chances. Get detailed feedback and optimization suggestions.

profile.title: My Profile
profile.welcomeMessage: Here you can see a summary of your activity and personal information.
